name: Martin Johns
content: Martin Johns Prof. Dr. Martin Johns Email: mj at martinjohns dot com Tel: +49 - (0)531-391-7466 Fax: +49 - (0)531-391-8111 Office Address TU Braunschweig Institute for Application Security Mühlenpfordtstr. 23 38106 Braunschweig, Germany [web] Links Google Scholar LinkedIn profile Xing profile Publications Malte Wessels, Simon Koch, Jan Drescher, Louis Bettels, David Klein, Martin Johns: HyTrack: Resurrectable and Persistent Tracking Across Android Apps and the Web in 34th USENIX Security Symposium (Usenix Sec'25), August 2025 (to appear) Simon Koch, Manuel Karl, Robin Kirchner, Malte Wessels, Anne Paschke, Martin Johns: The Impact of Default Mobile SDK Usage on Privacy and Data Protection in Proceedings on Privacy Enhancing Technologies (PoPETS'25), July 2025 (pdf, bib) Oussama Draissi, Tobias Cloosters, David Klein, Michael Rodler, Marius Musch, Martin Johns, Lucas Davi: Wemby’s Web: Hunting for Memory Corruption in WebAssembly in 34th ACM SIGSOFT International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis (ISSTA'25), June 2025 (to appear) Wirawan Agahari, Alexandra Dirksen, Martin Johns, Mark de Reuver, Tobias Fiebig: The Importance of Being Earnest: Shedding Light on Johnny's (False) Sense of Privacy in 46th IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy (IEEE S&P'25), May 2025 (to appear) Stefan Albert Horstmann, Sandy Hong, David Klein, Raphael Serafini, Martin Degeling, Martin Johns, Veelasha Moonsamy, Alena Naiakshina: Sorry for bugging you so much.
